description.value: Investigate the growth, structure, development, and other characteristics of microscopic organisms such as bacteria, algae, or fungi. Include medical microbiologists who study the relationship between organisms and disease or the effects of antibiotics on microorganisms.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this job: Generate latex dust using latex products Inhale aspergillus in bakery, beet sugar refinery, or biotechnology plant Repeatedly inhale bioaerosols of slime mold Work in a medical or research laboratory handling pathogens
